summary: Eric Saperston directs this amazing journey about a group of young Americans who decide to ask the age old question in life, "what do our elders have to pass down to us?"
cast: Eric Saperston|Jimmy Carter|Max Cleland|Billy Crystal|Billy Frank|Jerry Garcia|Marshall Goldsmith|Kathleen Kelly|Donald Keough|Gert Koppel|Dave Murcott|Paige O'Brien|Jack O'Neill|Ras Pidow|Ann Richards|William Sessions|Henry Winkler
title: The Journey
